H0.text: The Royal Navy introduced limes to the standard diet for crewmen to prevent what. Beriberi

H1.text: The Royal Navy introduced limes to the standard diet for crewmen to prevent what. Scurvy-like symptoms

H2.text: The Royal Navy introduced limes to the standard diet for crewmen to prevent what. Malaria

H3.text: The Royal Navy introduced limes to the standard diet for crewmen to prevent what. Scruvy

A4.text: British sailors consumed citrus, including limes, to prevent scurvy

A5.text: The practice was a closely guarded military secret
